Description.Name: LB 2-X Cluster Ammo
Description.Details: Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type. Ammo Bins will explode and destroy their installed location when they receive a Critical Hit. LB 2-X AC Cluster Ammo Bins each contain 12 rounds and may feed multiple weapons. Cluster rounds consist of submunitions contained in a single shell that detonates in close proximity to the target, showering it with 2 pellets. These deal 10 percent of weapon damage each. Base stability damage is 2 per submunition plus any weapon bonuses. Cluster rounds enjoy an inherent +1 bonus to accuracy as well as a 50% bonus chance to cause critical hits. Ammunition type can be changed by clicking the right side of the weapons activation panel during combat if more than one type of ammunition is present.
